body: Someone please translate it to chinese
its always repetitive, about becoming someone woman and mind break. All of the stories sanbun kyoden are like that.

Yeah me too, but at least in some of his/her work the ending left unclear, so I can just imagine the mc grab a little knife and stab it to the bad guy's penis, no, not the clean cut, just stab it nicely and leave it like that..

Sanbun Kyoden mothers are too brain-dead.I think the impact is much bigger when the mother does the deed with only ONE person(like a son best friend). I prefer tsuya tsuya plots than Kyoden.They(the mothers) looks more human than Kyoden ones.
I'm starting to hate this artist. So much motherxshota teasing but its always a stupid adult man ruining it.
